::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe growls. The threat of a Maximal army attacking him was not too 
welcome.

"I'll be back, Maximal," DeathScythe says in the whisper he always used, 
"Next time we see each other, you die."

He fires another shot at Lunarpine's chest, transforming into his hideous 
beast mode, thrusters emerging as he takes off, heading away from Lunarpine.
